title: Which technology should I learn now for a better future? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer to your question primarily depends on at what level you are and what is your current technologies. a generic answer is Don’t choose your technology based on future prospectus, choose it on the bases of available opportunity and your interest. If you are interested in a particular language, doesn’t know much about it but there is an opportunity in your company for that and they ask you to learn and join the team go for it.
Learn any of the below three technologies for better job prospects 1.cloud computing 2.data science 3.web development
